```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
islands_tbl <- 
  tibble(
    name = names(islands),
    size = islands,
    size2 = islands,
    size3 = islands,
    size4 = islands,
    size5 = islands
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(size)) %>%
  slice(1:4)
gt(islands_tbl, id = "one") %>% 
    opt_css(
    css = "
    #one .gt_table {
      background-color: skyblue;
      font-size: 26px;
      width:100%;
    }
    #one .gt_row {
      padding: 10px 20px;
    }
    #one .gt_col_heading {
      text-align: center !important;
    }
    "
  )
```
